columns.name: RowId
columns.description: Contains the unique identifier for this sample
columns.caption: Row Id

columns.name: SourceProtocolApplication
columns.description: Contains a reference to the protocol application that created this sample, if available
columns.caption: Source Protocol Application

columns.name: SourceApplicationInput
columns.description: Contains a reference to the MaterialInput row between this ExpMaterial and it's SourceProtocolApplication
columns.caption: Source Application Input

columns.name: RunApplication
columns.description: Contains a reference to the ExperimentRunOutput protocol application of the run that created this sample
columns.caption: Run Application

columns.name: RunApplicationOutput
columns.description: Contains a reference to the MaterialInput row between this ExpMaterial and it's RunOutputApplication
columns.caption: Run Application Output

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: Contains a reference to the protocol for the protocol application that created this sample
columns.caption: Source Protocol

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Contains a short description for this sample
columns.caption: Name

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Contains a description for this sample
columns.caption: Description

columns.name: SampleSet
columns.description: If this sample is a member of a sample set, contains a reference to the sample set
columns.caption: Sample Set

columns.name: Folder
columns.description: Contains a reference to the folder that holds this sample
columns.caption: Folder

columns.name: Run
columns.description: Contains a reference to the experiment run that created this sample, if available
columns.caption: Run

columns.name: LSID
columns.description: Contains a life sciences identifier for this sample
columns.caption: LSID

columns.name: Created
columns.description: Contains the date and time that this sample was added to the system
columns.caption: Created

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Contains the user that created this sample
columns.caption: Created By

columns.name: Modified
columns.description: Contains the date and time that this sample last modified
columns.caption: Modified

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Contains the user that last modified this sample
columns.caption: Modified By

columns.name: Flag
columns.description: Contains a reference to a user-editable comment about this row
columns.caption: Flag

columns.name: Inputs
columns.description: Contains a life sciences identifier for this sample
columns.caption: Inputs

columns.name: Outputs
columns.description: Contains a life sciences identifier for this sample
columns.caption: Outputs
